text: 2001 FIFA Confederations Cup was the 5th FIFA Confederations Cup tournament. It took place in South Korea and Japan from 30 May to 10 June. France won the tournament after defeating Japan. Australia got third place. ==Results== ===Group stage=== ====Group A==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 2 0 1 9 1 +8 6 3 2 0 1 3 1 +2 6 3 2 0 1 3 6 −3 6 3 0 0 3 1 8 −7 0 ====Group B==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 2 1 0 5 0 +5 7 3 1 2 0 2 0 +2 5 3 1 0 2 2 4 −2 3 3 0 1 2 0 5 −5 1 ===Knockout stage=== {{Round4-with third |7 June – Yokohama||1||0 |7 June – Suwon||2||1 |10 June – Yokohama||0||1 |9 June – Ulsan||1||0 }} ==References== ==Other websites== *RSSSF Category:FIFA Confederations Cup tournaments Category:2001 in association football Category:2001 in Asia Category:2000s in South Korea Category:2000s in Japan Category:Football in South Korea Category:Football in Japan
title: 2001 FIFA Confederations Cup
